answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!Losing Weight is possible only when your output is more than the input. Hence either your diet is not enough or what you eat is either metabolized very fast (as in hyperthyroidism) or is not absorbed properly (as in malabsorption syndrome). Diabetes is another reason for losing weight. A balance of carbohydrates, fats and proteins along with fresh fruits and vegetables, good source of calcium and iron should all be incorporated. The right quantity of each depends on the exercise level. Hence your coach is the best person to guide you. Besides this do consult your PCP once to rule out any disease.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
